content: 1 is the start of the round knit 1 round even as established then start gusset decreases as follows round 1 k to last 3 sts on needle k2tog k1 needle 1 k instep sts in pattern as established needles 2 & 3 k1 ssk k to end of needle needle 4 round 2 k even keeping instep sts in pattern as established repeat rnds 1 & 2 until 56 64 72 total stitches remain 2 © susie white 2014 foot work even with instep sts in pattern as established until foot measures 2 less than final desired length then work toe toe round 1 knit round 2 k to last 3 sts on needle k2tog k1 needle 1 k1 ssk k to end of needle needle 2 k to last 3 sts on needle k2tog k1 needle 3 k1 ssk k to end of needle needle 4 repeat rnds 1 & 2 until 24 total sts remain 6 on each needle finish cut yarn leaving a 12 tail graft remaining sts together using the kitchener st weave in ends pattern row 1 k6 p2 row 2 k5 p2 k1 row3 k4 p2 k2 row 4 k3 p2 k3 row 5 k2 p2 k4 row 6 k1 p2 k5 row 7 p2 k6 row 8 p1 k6 p1 chart legend k ~ knit p ~ purl 3 © susie white 2014
